general_advisory: Weather forecast suggests dry weather with light rainfall on Sunday with clear to overcast sky conditions. Wind speed ranges between 16-18 km/h. Maximum and minimum temperatures expected to be between 35-38°C and 23-25°C respectively. Crop coverage is at 98% with normal conditions.

advisory: Yellow stem borer management - Apply Fipronil 5%SC @ 400ml/acre or Flubendiamide 20% WG @ 50g/acre or Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC @ 60ml /acre or Chromafenozide 80%WP @ 50g/acre for stem borer infestation.

Blast Disease Management - Use Hexaconazole 5 % SC @ 400-ml/acre or Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4 % S.C @ 200-ml/acre or Tebuconazole 50%+ Trifloxystrobin 25 % WG @ 80-gram/acre for blast disease.

Tobacco Caterpillar Management - Dust with Chlorpyriphos 1.5 % D @ 10 kg or spray Novaluron 5.25 %+ Indoxacarb 4.25 % @ 400-ml/acre or Lambda Cyhalothrin 4.9 CS @ 300 ml or Flubendiamide 20 % WG @ 120 gram for caterpillars.
For spraying 200 litre of water per acre is required.
Early Shoot Borer - Spray Fipronil 5 % SC @ 600ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC  @ 400ml/acre or Chlorantraniliprole 18.5 % SC @ 150-ml/acre for shoot borer.
Brinjal shoot and fruit borer - Install pheromone traps with Leucin Lure per acre and spray neem-based pesticide for pest management. Use chemical control for severe infestations.
Yellow mosaic viral disease (YMV) - Manage whitefly infestation and rogue out diseased plants. Use Neem based pesticide or chemical pesticides for control.
Mango hopper - Spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL or Thiamethoxam 25% W.G or Acetamiprid 20% S.P for hopper control.
